Literature.Title: A54145 a new lipopeptide antibiotic complex: microbiological evaluation.
Literature.Author: Counter FT, Allen NE, Fukuda DS, Hobbs JN, Ott J, Ensminger PW, Mynderse JS, Preston DA, Wu CY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=1µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus sp.(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens ATCC 3624(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>176µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=21µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=109µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=<0.9µg/ml)
